verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou O Lord
Are a shield about me
You're my glory
You're the lifter of my head
Thou O Lord
Are a shield about me
You're my glory
You're the lifter of my head

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah hallelujah hallelujah
You're the lifter of my head
